headline: Crypto for Advisors: To Crypto or Not to Crypto?
summary: The financial advisory industry is at a crossroads. Cryptocurrency is no longer a speculative fringe asset; it’s becoming a part of the modern economy. Advisors who dismiss or ignore it risk alienating clients looking for forward-thinking guidance.

raw.headline: Crypto for Advisors: To Crypto or Not to Crypto?
raw.summary: The financial advisory industry is at a crossroads. Cryptocurrency is no longer a speculative fringe asset; it’s becoming a part of the modern economy. Advisors who dismiss or ignore it risk alienating clients looking for forward-thinking guidance.

headline: BlackRock, State Street & Vanguard Face Antitrust Violation Lawsuit
summary: Texas and 10 other states accuse BLK, STT and Vanguard of committing antitrust violations and boosting energy prices by using their investment influence.

headline: BlackRock Near Deal to Buy HPS for Close to $12 Billion, FT Says
summary: (Bloomberg) -- BlackRock Inc. is close to an agreement to buy private credit group HPS Investment Partners, as the world’s largest asset manager tries to compete in the fast-growing alternatives space, the Financial Times reported. headline: BlackRock has deal to buy private credit manager HPS, FT reports
summary: The final deal value would be closer to $12 billion, which offers a significant premium over HPS's post-IPO valuation of $10 billion, the report said, citing two sources familiar with the matter.  BlackRock declined to comment and HPS Investment did not immediately respond to a Reuters request for comment.  HPS Investment Partners is a global investment firm managing assets across debt, liquid credit including syndicated leveraged loans, asset-based finance and real estate, according to its website.
